message.content:
To achieve this, you can use the following formula in a new cell:
```
=REPLACE(SUBSTITUTE("'", ""), "'", ""):P&LIMIT="1"
```
This will replace all single quotes with nothing and then copy the result into the new cell. The `P&LIMIT="1"` part ensures that only one character is copied at a time, which helps to avoid any errors if there are multiple single quotes in the original text.
